ygData.subject: More advice please.
ygData.msgSnippet: I should be making 14 later this week and would like to know what spells are best to get first.   As you all are aware money is a definite problem at this
ygData.messageBody:
I should be making 14 later this week and would like to know what spells are
best to get first. As you all are aware money is a definite problem at
this level.

I had a wonderful week as far as donations to my equipment goes. I was
given a banded tunic and a blackened neck guard plus getting rawhide gloves
from a zombie really helped. A few lootings of ghouls has also helped my
bank account a lot.

I am still having trouble finding groups at times but so far with only one
exception I have not lost a party member yet. The only exception was an
ill-fated venture into Oasis when I was still 11th. I really think that
upon making 14 I will head back to GFay. I have nothing against Freeport
and EC but I think the humans are all jealous of us elves. (grins)

Thanks again all,
Yilari, High Elven Cleric of Tunare
Erollisi Marr
Blades of Honor Guild
